name: Crazy Patchwork lavender sachet
description:
All the fabrics come from my fabric stash basket and have been cut out and sewn onto a cotton backing.

	They are crammed full of English lavender. The reverse in a beautiful vintage lilac striped cotton.

	And the top them off they have a Mother of Pearl button embellishment and red gingham to hang them wherever takes your fancy!

	Approx. 15cm x 12cm
This auction is for one sachet only

	Please note: each one will be slightly different as they are all unique!
